At 09:53 AM 2/21/02 -0800, you wrote:
>First, let's get to the initial topic of this thread.
>
>As posted previousely by several other fellow developers, you can always
>have two source paths, one for the source and one for the test cases.
>  In this way, JavaDoc will not have any problems any more. ...

pm4ji, but are you implying that the source for test classes will be in a 
different directory? (this would mean that the test class can not belong to 
the same package as class that it is testing).
